title: Gila Cliff Dwellings National Monument: Guided Tours
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Things To Do     Guided Tours              Guided Tours        Visitors on a guided tour. NPS Photo   Â   Guided tours through the Gila Cliff Dwellings are offered daily at 11 am and throughout the day as staffing allows. Please note that the tour begins at the cliff dwellings, approximately one-half mile from the Gila Cliff Dwellings trailhead. Give yourself time to hike up the trail and be at the program on time. Visitors are free to tour the cliff dwellings on their own anytime during park hours. Visitor hours at the cliff dwellings are normally 9 am to 4 PM Mountain Time year-round. Other tours, programs, and special events may be offered depending upon staff availability. Check the website calendar, visit the official Facebook page and calendar, or call the Gila Visitor Center at 575-536-9461 for the latest information.
